text:
The changelog produced by CvsChangeLog (changelog.xml) contains misleading/wrong
timestamps (12 hour clock).

The file contains timestamp strings like 03:24 for 03:24 w/o distinguishing
between am and pm. (It should produce 15:24, or at least 03:24 pm)
creator: rainer.werlein@medav.de

text:
Please don't forget to select the 'ant version' you're reporting the bug 
against. I'm assuming 1.5.x.



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11582 ***
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
